about_the_game:
Step into the heart of social unrest in Protest Simulator – a gripping simulation that immerses you in the struggle for justice, freedom, and order. In a world where ideologies collide and power dynamics shift, Protest Simulator lets you experience the tension from both sides of the barricade, as you choose between becoming a passionate protester or a dedicated law enforcer.

Choose Your Role:

As a Protester:

  • Rally the Masses: Take to the streets with your message. Whether you're leading chants, organizing marches, or fighting for social change, your role is vital in igniting the fire of revolution. Each protest is an opportunity to shift the course of history.

  • Strategic Resistance: Build barricades, set up blockades, and take direct action to disrupt the system. As a protester, the power lies in your unity and the strength of your convictions.

  • Make Your Voice Heard: Lead your fellow protesters with passionate speeches or quiet determination. But be wary—the path of resistance is never straightforward, and the consequences of your choices will echo throughout the game.

As a Law Enforcer:

  • Defend the Order: As a member of the law enforcement, it’s your job to maintain public safety, protect critical landmarks, and prevent property damage. You are the face of authority and control in a time of social upheaval.

  • Reinforce and Protect: Set up barricades, command the streets, and deploy your team. You’ll need to manage both crowd control and public relations, balancing diplomacy with authority. The fate of your city rests in your hands.

  • Decide When to Stand Firm: Every protest presents a choice: escalate with force or seek to de-escalate with negotiation. Your actions will either solidify your reputation or ignite further resistance.

Core Features:

  • Dual Perspectives: Step into the shoes of a passionate protester or a disciplined law enforcer, each with distinct missions, goals, and challenges. The story changes depending on your choices—play both sides to understand the full scope of the conflict.

  • Tactical Depth: Both protesters and law enforcers must carefully plan their moves. Organize large-scale demonstrations, set traps for the opposition, or reinforce police lines as you manage evolving situations in real time.

  • Dynamic Events: The streets are never the same. Expect unexpected twists, from political leaders’ speeches that sway public opinion, to media influence that can change the tide of the protest. Every protest is a living, breathing event.

  • Realistic Simulation: From the sound of the marching crowds to the crack of riot shields, Protest Simulatorcaptures the intensity of street-level activism and law enforcement, providing an immersive experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

  • Choices that Matter: Every decision you make—from what tools you equip to how you engage with the opposition—has a real impact on the narrative. The truth isn’t one-sided; it’s shaped by your actions.

  • Morality & Perspective: Challenge your views and question your choices. Will you stand with the people fighting for change, or will you protect the established order? In Protest Simulator, the lines between good and evil are often blurred.

Game Flow:

The journey through Protest Simulator is a dynamic, evolving experience. Whether you're organizing a peaceful march or defending your city's landmarks from destruction, each playthrough offers new challenges and surprises.

  • As a Protester: You’ll start small, perhaps with a single spark of an idea, and grow into a leader of a mass movement. Use your charisma, wit, and tactical genius to win over the hearts and minds of the people. Organize, strategize, and—if needed—fight for what you believe in.

  • As a Law Enforcer: Begin with a simple mission to maintain order, but as tensions rise, your choices become more critical. Will you uphold the law by any means necessary, or will you seek to de-escalate the conflict? Your leadership and decision-making are put to the test in each new protest.

Key Highlights:

  • Immersive World: The game world is a living, breathing city. Watch as protests grow, evolve, and interact with media, government officials, and citizens. Your choices influence the city’s future.

  • Emotion-Driven Gameplay: From the rising tension in the crowd to the pulse-pounding moments when the police line forms, the emotional stakes are high. The mood of the people, the officers, and even bystanders change dynamically as you take actions that shape the atmosphere.

  • Authentic Sound Design: The ambient soundscape of protests—the chants, the clashes, the sirens, the cries of both protestors and enforcers—immerses you in every moment. Feel the weight of the action as it unfolds around you.

  • Complex Moral Dilemmas: Every protest is not just about opposing sides—it's about understanding motives, desires, and consequences. Will you stand for your beliefs, or will you maintain the peace, no matter the cost?
